BroadcastCommands.hands:
=== How to Raise/Lower Your Hand ===
* Option 1: At the bottom of the screen, click Reactions, then Raise Hand.
* Option 2: At the bottom of the screen, click Participants to open the Participant List; At the bottom of that list is the Raise Hand option.
* Option 3: Keyboard shortcut: Press Alt+Y.
Repeat the same procedure to lower your hand.<tts>Here are instructions on how to raise and lower your virtual hand.</tts>
